Without this permission the app would be unable to upload any document. When uploading a document, the app requires access to photos, media and files on your device. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?

Without this permission the app would be unable to save the document. When downloading a document, the app requires access to external storage with write permission. Are you sure you want to deny this permission?
App Needs the Permission to Read the External Storage but you had previously checked the Button Never Ask Again.

Field Officer Application is an application developed for the Bank staff field officer to keep track of Clients, Centers, Groups, Loan Account, Savings Account, etc.
